title: LIVE IN THE ♡ ♡ ♡ OF SOMERVILLE! 3BED/2BH, GYM, POOL - PETS OK
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302391334', 'Rent: $5,761 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: Now oer September', 'Call Brandon Level', 'Now 617 888 6265', 'Located in Somerville Walk to Orange Line, By Cambridge, Near Charlestown, Assembly Row, Medford, Inman Sq., Boston.', 'Easy commute to Back Bay, Green Line, Red Line to Downtown, South End.', 'South Boston', 'FEATURES', '7 Minutes to Downtown', 'A/C', 'Bike Storage & Repair Staions', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Central Air', 'City View(s)', 'Clubroom', 'Clubroom Lounge with Kitchen', 'Coffee bar', 'Courtyard with Grilling Stations', 'Cyber Lounge', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Dog Washing Spa', 'Elevator', 'Fitness Center', 'Garage Parking', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Cabinets', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Marble Bath', 'Microwave', 'Modern Bath', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'Package acceptance', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Refrigerator', 'Rentable Meeting / Dining Space', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Stainless Steel GE Appliances', 'Stove', 'Swimming Pool', 'Track Lighting', 'Walk in Closets', 'Washer/Dryer In Unit', 'WiFi featured throughout all indoor and outdoor amenities', 'Another Level Realty LLC', 'Call Now', '617 888 6265', "IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME.", 'I HAVE THOUSANDS OF OTHER PROPERTIES.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable, it is represented subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.']
